modmenu.descriptionTranslation.racehud: This mod adds a racing style HUD, configurable, for riding a boat, and is designed mostly for racing boats on ice.
racehud.config.title: RaceHUD Options
racehud.tooltip.extended: Enables g meter and input trace display
racehud.tooltip.telemetry_directory: The path where telemetry files will be saved at
racehud.tooltip.checkpoint_directory: The path where checkpoint files will be loaded from
racehud.tooltip.checkpoint_file: The checkpoint file used for delta comparison
racehud.tooltip.circular_track: Reset checkpoints after reaching the final checkpoint
racehud.tooltip.laptime_stats: Display statistics about your laptimes on the left side of the screen
racehud.tooltip.checkpoint_skip: Skip to certain checkpoint for practising section of track
racehud.tooltip.bar_type: Change the display and behavior of the speed bar:
racehud.tooltip.bar_type.packed: Water & Packed: Best for low speeds.
racehud.tooltip.bar_type.mixed: Mixed: Best for running on any kind of ice.
racehud.tooltip.bar_type.blue: Blue: Suitable mostly for blue ice racing.
racehud.tooltip.y_offset: Change y offset of the main HUD from the bottom of the screen
